title: Basking in Memories
detail_text: <:th_ch0202/>Yesterday‚Äôs party was so fun~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>Agreed. The decorations were awesome, and the feast was amazing......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>It was also fun to see each other‚Äôs cute costumes.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>The Christmas movie was so funny. Though I spent so much time looking at the photos that everyone uploaded that I almost stayed up all night.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Let‚Äôs look at the photos again~ ùÖ†<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>No.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Whaat!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>I know you want to bask in the memories of yesterday. But Kasumi-san...... If you don‚Äôt complete your winter break homework as planned, you‚Äôre going to cry when the new school term starts.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Kasumin won‚Äôt cry this time~!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>I‚Äôll wipe away as many tears as I can for you! Now, open your textbook.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
